text: Carmen Margarita Zapata (July 15, 1927 â€“ January 5, 2014) was an American actress. She appeared in over one hundred movies and shows, including Batman: The Animated Series, Married... with Children, Sister Act, and she was Carmen Castillo in Santa Barbara. Zapata died on January 5, 2014 from heart failure in Los Angeles, California. She was 86.Actress Carmen Zapata Dies at 86: Hollywood Reporter website.
